.. _class_Light3D_property_distance_fade_length:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`float<class_float>` **distance_fade_length** = ``10.0`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Light3D_property_distance_fade_length>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_distance_fade_length**\ (\ value\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )
- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_distance_fade_length**\ (\ )

ç¯å…‰åŠå…¶é˜´å½±æ¶ˆå¤±çš„è·ç¦»ã€‚ç¯å…‰çš„èƒ½é‡å’Œé˜´å½±çš„ä¸é€æ˜åº¦ï¼Œåœ¨æ­¤è·ç¦»å†…é€æ¸é™ä½ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆå®Œå…¨ä¸å¯è§ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ä»…å¯¹ :ref:`OmniLight3D<class_OmniLight3D>` å’Œ :ref:`SpotLight3D<class_SpotLight3D>` æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_Light3D_property_light_volumetric_fog_energy:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`float<class_float>` **light_volumetric_fog_energy** = ``1.0`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Light3D_property_light_volumetric_fog_energy>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_param**\ (\ param\: :ref:`Param<enum_Light3D_Param>`, value\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )
- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_param**\ (\ param\: :ref:`Param<enum_Light3D_Param>`\ ) |const|

ä¸ :ref:`light_energy<class_Light3D_property_light_energy>` ç›¸ä¹˜çš„æ¬¡çº§ä¹˜æ•°ï¼Œç„¶åä¸ :ref:`Environment<class_Environment>` çš„ä½“ç§¯é›¾ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå¯ç”¨ï¼‰ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚å¦‚æœè®¾ç½®ä¸º ``0.0``\ ï¼Œå°†ç”¨äºè¯¥ç¯çš„ä½“ç§¯é›¾è®¡ç®—å°†è¢«è·³è¿‡ï¼Œè¿™å¯ä»¥åœ¨å¯ç”¨ä½“ç§¯é›¾æ—¶æé«˜å¤§é‡ç¯å…‰çš„æ€§èƒ½ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ é™¤é :ref:`Environment.volumetric_fog_temporal_reprojection_enabled<class_Environment_property_volumetric_fog_temporal_reprojection_enabled>` è¢«ç¦ç”¨ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…é™¤éé‡æŠ•å½±çš„é‡æ˜¾è‘—é™ä½ï¼‰ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸ºé˜²æ­¢çŸ­æš‚çš„åŠ¨æ€å…‰æ•ˆä¸ä½“ç§¯é›¾çš„äº’åŠ¨æ€§å·®ï¼Œè¿™äº›æ•ˆæœä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çš„å…‰åº”å°† :ref:`light_volumetric_fog_energy<class_Light3D_property_light_volumetric_fog_energy>` è®¾ç½®ä¸º ``0.0``\ ã€‚
